profile.name: Lorraine
profile.title: Grand Elidoran Scholar Lorraine
profile.story: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the Demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis Continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said that even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were all once her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora Forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the Holy Sword.

1.name: Thornbush Forest
1.description: Deals [ffc800]333(1+0.3Skill Level)+153.2% of Attack Power[-] as Magic Damage [64ffff]3 times[-] to a random enemy and nearby enemies, [fa96fa]stunning[-] them for [64ffff]1.8 sec[-].

2.name: Seed of Belladonna
2.description:
Creates [fa96fa][Belladonna Seed][-] in the area around the target for [64ffff]7 sec[-].
[fa96fa][Belladonna Seed]:[-] Deals [ffc800]403(1+0.3Skill Level)+146.2% of Attack Power[-] as Magic Damage every [64ffff]1 sec[-] to nearby enemies and reduces their healing received by [ff6464]25%[-] for [64ffff]1 sec[-].

3.name: Wrath of the Forest
3.description: Deals [ffc800]304(1+0.3Skill Level)+112.2% of Attack Power[-] as Magic Damage [64ffff]6 time[-] to enemies in a wide area in front and [fa96fa]knocks them down[-] for [64ffff]1.8 sec[-].

4.name: Poison
4.description: On Normal and skill attacks, inflicts [fa96fa][Poison][-] on the target, dealing continuous Magic Damage equal to [ffc800]100% of Attack Power[-] every [64ffff]1 sec[-] for [64ffff]20 sec[-] and reducing their healing received by [ff6464]5%[-]. This effect stacks up to [64ffff]5 times[-].

light.effect: Reduces the target's Mana by 250. If the target is a boss, reduces it by 500 instead.

dark.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, but damage dealt is increased by 100%.
Enemies hit suffer increased status ailment duration by 30% for {1} sec.

light.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, but damage dealt is increased by 80%.

dark.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, but removes beneficial effects from enemies within range.

light.effect: For each [Poison] stack, the target's Attack is reduced by 5%.

dark.effect: If the target is a boss, [Poison] damage is increased by 70%.
At the start of battle, all skill cooldowns are reduced by 30%, and damage dealt to non-hero enemies is increased by 10% for 90 sec. The damage increase stacks up to 5 times and cannot be dispelled.

uw.name: World Tree's Will, Roburu
uw.description: Every 7 sec, deals Magic Damage equal to {0}% of Attack Power to poisoned enemies, reduces their Magic Defense by {1}% for 10 sec, and increases their Magic Damage taken by {2}%.
uw.story: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen one. The branch radiates with eternal life, granting immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the Stone of the Forest, an Elven treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

1.name: Root of the World Tree
1.description: [Thornbush Forest] Increases DMG by {1}% and reduces Cooldown by {2} sec.
1.story: Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of the deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

2.name: Deadly Belladonna
2.description: [Seed of Belladonna] Reduces Mana Cost by 1, Mana of hit enemies by {1}, and recovers own Mana by {2}.
2.story:
The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna.
It's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

3.name: Book of Life
3.description: [Wrath of the Forest] Increases DMG by 20%. Upon a Crit Hit on enemies with 5 or more stacks of Poison, reduces Cooldown by 4%.
3.story:
The Book containing knowledge about all life in the forest.
A magical book passed down among the guardians of the World Tree since ancient times. After being in the hands of Elidoran sages for a long time, Lorraine now has it in safekeeping.

4.name: Terrarium of Circulation
4.description: makes Poison effect irremovable and increases DMG dealt to Bosses by {1}%.
4.story:
A terrarium made with a broken World Tree twig.
As breaking of twigs of the World Tree is considered very bad luck, they are normally purified and discarded.
However, Lorraine received a new revelation from it and decided to make a small terrarium out of it.
